name: ADTELLIGENCE
tag_list: adtelligence, social-targeting, business-models, monetization, network-economy, virtual-economics, social-networks, web-analytics, social-media, targeting, social-apps, ad-networks, web-2-0, new-market-intelligence, marketing-intelligence-2-0
overview:
Adtelligence provides your business with next generation Social Marketing & CRM solutions based on big data. Adtelligence empowers advertisers & ecommerce shops to increase conversion rates trough real time personalization of content, advertsing and product recommendations on ecommerce shop and news portals Adtelligence delivers the solutions for data driven advertising, social personalization and full automation of your online marketing. Services such as real time personalization,ad-serving, social targeting and full process automation for agencies, ad networks and publishers to real time dynamic personalization of ecommerce shops and next generation user profile analytics and business intelligence to measure who is buying what.

Real time personalization and conversion optimization Convert+ is your conversion optimizer, which will boost your eCommerce shop performance to remarkable success.

It provides only the most relevant content to your shop visitors by matching Google adwords, Facebook social & CRM data in real-time and generates the whole eCommerce shop on the fly.

Using single sign on services like Facebook Connect, CRM data or open social, Experience Social Commerce in reality: Convert+ leverages the usersal social & interest graph to personalize website experience in real time. Every visitor sees the things he or she likes. Become part of the personalized web: Convert+ is an automated optimization of your complete sales funnel to further increase conversion rates and revenues. Our analytics tools will help you create a Social CRM and provides you with additional information about user segments and with which audience you monetize your shop the most.

Solutions for ad networks, sales houses and publishers

AdEx+ is your private social + video ad server including targeting, campaign mgmt, social and location based targeting, publisher inventory mgmt, real time reporting and social analytics. You can integrate and manage multiple inventories, platforms and exchanges and gain efficiency through our automation tools. AdEx+ gives you more control and transparency by offering full process integration with business intelligence and automated billing and invoicing, plus access to Facebook and Google inventory.

For more information about ADTELLIGENCE please visit www.adtelligence.de
